title: Several Fonts for Logo Redraw
content:
Hello all,

You've all been very helpful before and I'm afraid I need your help again. I need to redraw several logos in vectors so that they can be used for Print. But instead of redrawing all the fonts, I thought it best to just ask the Typophiles which fonts these are. I recognize most of them, but I can't find their names of the top of my head.

Thanks in advance,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825061959im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logoscompo_5621.jpg)
author: Thorens

comments.content:
#4 is [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825061959/http:/www.typography.net/type/font/bliss#)  
#2 could be Helvetica, Arial, Akzidenz Grotesk… Too small for me.  
#3 looks like Papyrus, which is not.  
#1 the Sans looks like Futura
#3 is closer to [Tempus Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825061959/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/tempus-sans/) than Papysus, although I'm not sure about the "e".

#3 is indeed Tempus Sans ITC. That was one of those I recognized but couldn't put my finger on. Thanks!

The font for Eureka is one I need to find. The other ones I think I can manage, but that one, I recognize it, but wouldn't have a clue were to begin looking.

Found it!  
 [Chiller](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825061959/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203992)

Any help on the others still welcome, though I probably can manage them myself.
Nice one. I recognized Chiller but couldn't remember what it's called.
